events.message: I received my order last week but want to request a refund because the item is not as described and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been classified under the 'Refund' category based on the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. who specializes in refund processing and customer care.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund and I'm here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request accurately?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The product does not match the description on your site and I was very disappointed with the quality.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a full refund for your order. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund processing. I appreciate your help resolving this issue so smoothly.
The refund case has been marked resolved. If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
Just checking in to ensure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
We are closing this case now since the refund has been successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
